definition: Minquan county in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan
Minquan county in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan

democracy/civil liberties/principle of democracy, the second of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning widespread popular involvement in affairs of state)
International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights (ICCPR)
pinyin: gong1 min2 quan2 li4 he2 zheng4 zhi4 quan2 li4 guo2 ji4 gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 公民权利和政治权利国际公约

sentences.english: I was born in the village of Minquan, in Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 在河南郑州的民权村出生。

sentences.english: In his speech, he compared the plight of gays to that of blacks during the civil-rights era.
sentences.chinese: 他在演讲中将同志的境遇比作民权运动时期的黑人。

sentences.english: Chiang jumped into politics after deciding to be a civil rights attorney.
sentences.chinese: 成为民权法律师后，江步入了政界。

sentences.english: White supremacists devise new methods to disenfranchise Negroes.
sentences.chinese: 白人至上论者想出新的方法以剥夺黑人的公民权。

sentences.english: No bill of attainder or ex post facto Law shall be passed.
sentences.chinese: 不得通过公民权利剥夺法案或追溯既往的法律。

sentences.english: Are there many students today interested in practicing civil rights law?
sentences.chinese: 在今天的学生中，希望成为民权法律师的人多吗？

sentences.english: Chatper Five is a retrospection about the practice of civil rights in Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分为广西民权主义实践的检讨。

sentences.english: He distinguished himself as a civil rights leader.
sentences.chinese: 他以民权运动领袖而闻名。

sentences.english: Civil Rights workers were murdered in various states.
sentences.chinese: 在各个州都有民权运动的工作者遭到杀害。

sentences.english: Colin is debarred from voting as he is not a citizen.
sentences.chinese: 柯林不享有公民权，所以不能参加投票。

sentences.english: These are the just and reasonable demands of a righteous public.
sentences.chinese: 这是享有公民权的公众的正当合理要求。

sentences.english: By 1964, the Civil Rights movement had accomplished amazing things.
sentences.chinese: 到了1964年，民权运动已经取得了，惊人的成就。

sentences.english: The Min Chuan W. Rd . bus-only lane will be extended to Neihu next year.
sentences.chinese: 民权西路公车专用道明年起将延伸至内湖路段。

sentences.english: Wofford was a deeply moral advocate of health-care reform and civil rights.
sentences.chinese: 沃福德在道义上极力提倡医保改革和民权。

sentences.english: They have not contented themselves with wistful pleas formore democracy or civil rights.
sentences.chinese: 他们并不满足于热切的恳求更多的民族或者公民权利。

sentences.english: The Senate subcommittee has already reported out four civil-rights bills.
sentences.chinese: 参议院小组已将四项民权法案交回。

definition: Martin Luther King, Jr. (1929-1968), American clergyman and civil rights activist

democracy/civil liberties/principle of democracy, the second of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning widespread popular involvement in affairs of state)
